segments.text: Watching this, the woman's so intent on her dishwashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, sink full, water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down like crazy, forming a lake on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in it, drying away happily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are having fun with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the stool, reaching in for goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool wobbles, but he's steady so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such innocent mischief in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets show the jar full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks inviting and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amusing how they're pulling this off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I chuckle at their sneaky adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope they share with mom later.
segments.speaker: PAR
